attributes.action: consider recession cutting measures to all services including frontline services. When it comes to bailing out the country, everyone has to help out.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bailing out the UK banking system, in effect bailing out the UK, is too big a job not to consider cutting costs of frontline services too.

When the cost of running the NHS per annum is about half the UK's debt of £175Billion, it doesn't make sense ring fencing sacred cows.
